pages.text: <li>takes a <l>(misc/crafting_material#gene_sample)genetic sample</l> from bees, trees and butterflies<li>can also convert <mark>Extra Bees</> serum into <mod> samples<li>consumes <l>(misc/crafting_material#labware)Labware</l> and <l>(misc/crafting_material#gene_sample_blank)Blank Samples</l> in the process<li>will randomly select 1 genetic trait from the input<li>the sample creature will not survive the process
Can be used to extract genetic traits.
